com.stripe.android

Class GooglePayJsonFactory

  • com.stripe.android.GooglePayJsonFactory

  • public class GooglePayJsonFactory

    A factory for generating Google Pay JSON request objects for Google Pay API version 2.0.

    See Also:
    Google Pay JSON request objects

    • Field Detail

      • Companion

        public static com.stripe.android.GooglePayJsonFactory.Companion Companion
        Deprecated. 

    • Constructor Detail

      • GooglePayJsonFactory

        public GooglePayJsonFactory(@NotNull
                            GooglePayConfig googlePayConfig,
                            boolean isJcbEnabled)

        A factory for generating Google Pay JSON request objects for Google Pay API version 2.0.

        Parameters:
        isJcbEnabled -

        Enable JCB as an allowed card network. By default, JCB is disabled.

        JCB currently can only be accepted in Japan.

        See Also:
        Google Pay JSON request objects

      • GooglePayJsonFactory

        public GooglePayJsonFactory(@NotNull
                            android.content.Context context,
                            boolean isJcbEnabled)

        class PaymentConfiguration must be instantiated before calling this.

        Parameters:
        isJcbEnabled -

        Enable JCB as an allowed card network. By default, JCB is disabled.

        JCB currently can only be accepted in Japan.

        See Also:
        class PaymentConfiguration

    • Method Detail

      • createIsReadyToPayRequest

        @NotNull
public org.json.JSONObject createIsReadyToPayRequest(@Nullable
                                                              com.stripe.android.GooglePayJsonFactory.BillingAddressParameters billingAddressParameters,
                                                              @Nullable
                                                              java.lang.Boolean existingPaymentMethodRequired)

        IsReadyToPayRequest

        Parameters:
        billingAddressParameters - Configure additional fields to be returned for a requested billing address.
        existingPaymentMethodRequired - If set to true, then the isReadyToPay() class method will return true if the currentviewer is ready to pay with one or more payment methods specified inallowedPaymentMethods.
        See Also:
        IsReadyToPayRequest

      • createPaymentDataRequest

        @NotNull
public org.json.JSONObject createPaymentDataRequest(@NotNull
                                                             com.stripe.android.GooglePayJsonFactory.TransactionInfo transactionInfo,
                                                             @Nullable
                                                             com.stripe.android.GooglePayJsonFactory.BillingAddressParameters billingAddressParameters,
                                                             @Nullable
                                                             com.stripe.android.GooglePayJsonFactory.ShippingAddressParameters shippingAddressParameters,
                                                             boolean isEmailRequired,
                                                             @Nullable
                                                             com.stripe.android.GooglePayJsonFactory.MerchantInfo merchantInfo)

        PaymentDataRequest

        Parameters:
        transactionInfo - Details about the authorization of the transaction based upon whether the user agrees tothe transaction or not. Includes total price and price status.
        billingAddressParameters - Configure additional fields to be returned for a requested billing address.
        shippingAddressParameters - Specify shipping address restrictions.
        isEmailRequired - Set to true to request an email address.
        merchantInfo - Merchant name encoded as UTF-8. Merchant name is rendered in the payment sheet.In TEST environment, or if a merchant isn't recognized, a “Pay Unverified Merchant” message is displayed in the payment sheet.
        See Also:
        PaymentDataRequest
